name: Dapper Destiny
description:
HEY you! Would you like to become a fancy, exquisite  skeleton who had to go through scenarios to achieve his ultimate goal...Gaining a new body? However fate took it's turn and decided to create his adventure as a game, now he was destined to die...Will you change his story and change his fate?

Contributors:

Daniel Zilberleyb - Programmer

Rahul Sharma - Writer

Kyle Randall - Animations, Music

Edem Sedor - Art

Sebastian Ceballos - Design
